name: Retro Jumping Frog
description:
Help this little frog to reach home! Cross roads and rivers, avoid cars, cocodriles, serpents and jump over turtles. 
Retro Jumping Frog is awesome and you will feel like playing these old arcade games again.
Classic game with 2 touch screen control modes.
CRT screen modes like old arcade machines.
Google Games supported, share your highscore and achievements!
Extra life every 10000 points.
If you enjoy retro games, you will enjoy this!
